comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Verified-1

did not built on profile=tizen_common_daily_x11_x86_64

Patch Set 1:

> did not built on profile=tizen_common_daily_x11_x86_64

It works for me but just like for ia32 it depends on the mesa config change that enables libxatracker. Can you confirm whether you did that before attempting to compile this and if so please send me the error message
Uploaded patch set 2.
Uploaded patch set 3.

Patch Set 3:

> Uploaded patch set 3.

You were missing an important commit that I had cherry-picked from upstream. You still need to build that against the modified compile config of mesa that provides the libxtracker library.
Uploaded patch set 4.
Patch Set 4: Verified+1

Patch Set 4:

yea this commit was supposed to be merged after :

https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/31563/

I will merge both if not done

Btw a bug id tag would help to track the reason we merged this downstream patch ...


check :

http://www.slideshare.net/rzrfreefr/tizen-upstreamcooptdc2014pcoval
Patch Set 5: Commit message was updated

Patch Set 5:

Please split your patches into spec and upstream cp 
then I will merge them both along mesa
since nobody objected yet

Does it sound good to you?
Uploaded patch set 6.
Uploaded patch set 7.
Patch Set 7: Verified+1
Patch Set 7: Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: xf86-video-vmware should not try to build into a pure wayland platform..
commitMessage:
xf86-video-vmware should not try to build into a pure wayland platform..

This package is designed for an X server platform.

In a system released, based exclusively on Wayland platform, it should be in a excluded status.

Tizen devel  | Tizen release
_____________|______________
succeeded    | succeeded
excluded     | excluded
broken       |
failed       |
unresolvable |
blocked      |
locked       |
note:
    - The disabled status is only
      allowed for OBS administration.

Change-Id: I63dc5fc9d502d6ce5eb1449495f9f30ca6d560ca
Signed-off-by: Ronan Le Martret <ronan@fridu.net>

https://bugs.tizen.org/jira/browse/PTREL-653
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

Patch Set 2:

The tag submit/accepted/tizen/mobile/20140213.072611 was pushed, but it was not completed because of the following reason(s):

- The commit 56100160a7e61acfb99585d17908d0a2b7da3767 tag attached does NOT exist in git tree or gerrit open change. Please make sure the commit has been pushed to gerrit and correct magical ref refs/for/branch, then re-submit tag.

Patch Set 4:

The tag submit/accepted/tizen/mobile/20140213.072631 was pushed, but it was not completed because of the following reason(s):

- The tag means you want to submit commit 69bcf7535298b06d28a23afd3474a35be8b3ea67 in accepted/tizen/mobile branch to OBS, but this commit does NOT exist in accepted/tizen/mobile branch. Please use correct branch name as version in tag name submit/{version}/{date.time}.

Suggest to use "gbs submit" to trigger submission, or use following command to create tag "git tag submit/${version}/$(date --utc +%%Y%%m%%d.%%H%%M%%S) -m "****" ".
